column4: because the dependencies of some Firefox related packages are set to require Firefox 3.0 instead of 3.5.
It's annoying, but there's probably some obscure reason for it so I just install them both and ignore firefox-3.0.
i keep getting a fullscreen flash crash in firefox and am wondering if it has anything to do with it
shouldn't be. firefox-3.0 and firefox-3.5 don't interfere with each other
